sentences.en: She also imagined a skillful closing argument and a winning trial.
sentences.cn: 她还设想了一个巧妙的结案陈词和一次胜诉的审判。

sentences.en: Although there are many skillful Braille readers, thousands of other blind people find it difficult to learn that system.
sentences.cn: 虽然现在有许多熟练的盲文读者，但还有成千上万的盲人认为学习盲文系统很困难。
